definition: emergency relief/to help the needy with cash or goods
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
emergency aid committee (of PRC Ministry of Civil Affairs 民政部)

sentences.english: The act expressly provides for injunctive relief.
sentences.chinese: 刑事救济规定对受害人进行充分补偿。

sentences.english: Muller Martini is seeking damages and injunctive relief.
sentences.chinese: 穆勒马提尼是要求赔偿和禁令救济。

sentences.english: “No dole, ” he instructed the legislative drafting team.
sentences.chinese: “没有救济金，”他这样指示立法起草小组。

sentences.english: He contributed half of his savings to the relief fund.
sentences.chinese: 他将积蓄的一半捐献给救济基金会。

sentences.english: The government alloted them 1800 yuan for relief, they again declined the offer.
sentences.chinese: 政府发给他们1800块钱的救济金，他们又没要。

sentences.english: The official was dismissed from office because he feathered his own nest with the relief fund for flood.
sentences.chinese: 那位官员被解除职务，因为他拿水灾救济金营私自肥。

sentences.english: The relief the plaintiff sought was an injunction and damages.
sentences.chinese: 原告请求的救济为强制令和损害赔偿金。

sentences.english: Famine here is very serious. The government has already given out relieving grain to this area.
sentences.chinese: 此地粮荒严重，政府已经在调拨救济粮了。

sentences.english: Second, extending unemployment benefits has a negative long-term effect on employment.
sentences.chinese: 第二，延长失业救济期限对就业存在长期负面影响。

sentences.english: Relief print quality depends on paper quality.
sentences.chinese: 救济打印质量取决于纸张质量。

sentences.english: Almsgiving is, to some extent, a religious ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 救济是，在某种程度上，一个宗教庆典活动。

sentences.english: Home is this cardboard box just next to the soup kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我家就是这个硬纸皮箱，邻近救济所。

sentences.english: The government doles out something to help the victims.
sentences.chinese: 政府发放了一些救济物品来帮助受难者。

sentences.english: It can fetch relief in both conjunctivitis and glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 它可以取救济两种结膜炎和青光眼。
上周首次申领失业救济金人数降至45万人。

sentences.english: He had accompanied a convoy of emergency food supplies to the starving people of Pader.
sentences.chinese: 当时他陪同运粮车队到帕德救济挨饿的百姓。

definition: help to the needy/emergency relief/charity/to give to poorer relative/(also 賙濟|赒济)
Zhou Ji (1781-1839), Qing writer and poet
(of an organization that has a duty of care) to give financial support to relatives of sb who has died or suffered serious injury
disadvantaged social groups (e.g. the handicapped)/the economically and politically marginalized/the dispossessed
